title: What is the main difference between the Amity Noida and Amity Jaipur campus? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me come to similarities first and then you will automatically understand the difference. Both are in UPBoth belong to ChauhansInfrastructure is amazing in both of themThey are same in terms of exam pattern or Job opportunities. In my time lucknow people were asked to come to Noida for placements.Crowd in both of them are above standard. Simply putting anyone with money get admission in any of them.Amity does bring lots of companies during placements. People are hired in bulk. Most of them will be service based companies offering package between 3–7 lakhs for engineering folks.So, if ease of attending job interviews is the priority then yes, Noida; however, if that is not the case then none of the campuses are different.

All campuses of Amity University is running under one umbrella. It means you really cant differentiate in any of the campuses. Both campus have beautiful infrastructure, amazing labs, experienced faculties, and placements. Almost all the good companies visit for placements at both campuses. Noida campus have maximum number of students Jaipur campus is the most beautiful campus among all the amity Campuses. Pollution free campus i must say. Studying in Jaipur campus will give you more exposure in terms of placements since you will have less competition.
